title: [Resolved] Possible data corruption
body: As per usual each day I open league and q up for ranked, after a relatively quick patch I find a game which is then immediately bugsplatted when trying to load, ok I can deal with that, try to re open league and it tells me I have corrupted files, literally seconds after patch, now I can deal with the lp loss but I'm more than likely going to get reported by forcing my team to remake and going to get an lpq, anyone else get this error ?

replies.body: It's not even allowing me to repair client manually, wtf is wrong with this patch

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=48bzHEZx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-26T03:27:18.502+0000)
>
> It's not even allowing me to repair client manually, wtf is wrong with this patch

Do you have a screenshot of the error that you're seeing?

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=48bzHEZx,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-26T04:14:30.866+0000) > > Do you have a screenshot of the error that you're seeing?
And you said that repairing your client did not remedy the problem, correct?

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=48bzHEZx,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-26T09:39:35.997+0000)
>
> And you said that repairing your client did not remedy the problem, correct?

Yes many times, even tried re installing

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=48bzHEZx,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-26T10:06:23.723+0000)
>
> Yes many times, even tried re installing

Can you provide the logs in your logs folder, notably the R3d logs and the patching logs?

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=48bzHEZx,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-26T12:26:42.489+0000)
>
> Can you provide the logs in your logs folder, notably the R3d logs and the patching logs?

How can I get them to you easily, just had a quick look through them and there seemed to be a lot of errors coming up

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=48bzHEZx,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-26T12:50:45.918+0000)
>
> How can I get them to you easily, just had a quick look through them and there seemed to be a lot of errors coming up

You can compress it into a ZIP or RAR file and upload it to http://upload.leaguevolunteers.com/

In the meantime, I'll ask around to see if this is a widespread issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=48bzHEZx,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-26T22:43:42.320+0000)
>
> You can compress it into a ZIP or RAR file and upload it to http://upload.leaguevolunteers.com/
> 
> In the meantime, I'll ask around to see if this is a widespread issue.

It's okay after the second full re install everything seems to be e
Working fine thanks for your help
That's good to hear! Sorry I couldn't help you too much and get this resolved sooner. Let me know if any issues arise in the future!

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=48bzHEZx,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-27T03:15:14.000+0000)
>
> That's good to hear! Sorry I couldn't help you too much and get this resolved sooner. Let me know if any issues arise in the future!

No dramas cheers mate
thats the message ive got after repairing the affected file 4 times and also doing a complete repair twice
Update after repairing my client loaded a bots and yet again bug splat which is followed by a data corruption message
